title: FS:  Some Graded T206's - No Longer Available
author: Buythatcard

posts.post_title: FS:  Some Graded T206's - No Longer Available
posts.post_content:
I have been selling on eBay for the past 15 years and have sold several cards thru Net54.  I am testing the waters again to see if it's time to move most of my business to Net54.

The following cards are for sale.  Prices are firm and payments must be made thru Paypal F/F.

Free S/H which will include tracking and insurance.


GRADED CARDS

Tom Downey......Piedmont 350/25 - PSA 1.5........................$31.00***Moving to eBay***
Bill Lattimore.....American Beauty 350/25 - SGC Authentic.....$67.00***Moving to eBay***
Harry Davis.......Piedmont 350-460/25 - SGC 50...................$71.00***Moving to eBay***
Fred Jacklitsch...Sweet Caporal 150/30 - PSA 2.....................$41.00***Moving to eBay***
Jerry Freeman...Sweet Caporal 350/30 - PSA 2.....................$42.00***Moving to eBay***
Red Ames..........Piedmont 350/25 - PSA 1.5.........................$34.00***Moving to eBay***
Fred Payne........Piedmont 350-460/25 - PSA 2.5...................$42.00***Moving to eBay***
Added new cards plus reduced price on a few.
Added more cards plus reduced prices on others.
Prices have been reduced on every card!
Remaining cards have been reduced again!  All others have been relisted on eBay.

Tonight 3/26/2019 will be the final night that I am offering these cards on the Net54 Forum.

They will be going back to eBay tomorrow.
